overview: When his troublemaker sister gets in trouble, Ah Long is tasked with smuggling and safely delivering a mysterious luggage in order to save her. To do this, he has to travel with the luggage from Tawau all the way to Kota Kinabalu. But while doing so, he accidentally cuffs the luggage to Aisha`s wrist. Now the two of them must work together if they want to survive, especially with both the criminals and the police going after them.
title: Craze Below The Wind
